definition: old age/very/eldest child in a family/leader of a group/boss/captain of a boat/leader of a criminal gang

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
regarding oneself as number one in terms of leadership, seniority or status
if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age
pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1
containing_words.word: 少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲

sentences.english: Time is running out for my friend.
sentences.chinese: 時光任苒，朋友已經老大不小了。

sentences.english: The driver hastens next handlebar grandpa uprear, apologize again and again.
sentences.chinese: 司機趕忙下車把老大爺扶起，並連連道歉。

sentences.english: As the proverb says , idle young, needy old.
sentences.chinese: 正如諺語所說，“少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲。”

sentences.english: The boatman nodded towards the north of the bay with some disdain.
sentences.chinese: 船老大略帶輕蔑神情朝海灣北部點了點頭。

sentences.english: The G.O.P. used to be the party of business.
sentences.chinese: 過去，美國老大黨曾是一個支持商業發展的黨派。

sentences.english: Oh we call him Biggie but his name is Todd.
sentences.chinese: 我們叫他老大，但他的名字是陶德。

sentences.english: Ceng Nianan modest recommended Han Jinquan do eldest brother, refuse Han Jinquan efforts.
sentences.chinese: 曾念安謙虛的推薦韓金銓做老大，韓金銓努力推辭。

sentences.english: The boss encounter any happy event , and so happy.
sentences.chinese: 老大，遇到什麼喜事了，這樣高興。

sentences.english: Have dish eldest brother now Xuan sky five extremely cover with one ax shadow to slaughter an moth tribe.
sentences.chinese: 今有盤老大玄天五絕漫天斧影屠戮蟲族。

sentences.english: He wants to be a Santa. Look! He forgot to wear the clothes.
sentences.chinese: 老大一定要當聖誕老人，搶了帽子卻忘了穿衣服。

sentences.english: The fruit seller palmed off some bad oranges onto the old lady.
sentences.chinese: 那水果商把一些壞桔子混充好的賣給了那位老大娘。

sentences.english: The captain of Dad's boat refused to go any farther.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸座的船的船老大拒絕繼續前進。

sentences.english: Thought Laotaibuxiao, still no one to patronize.
sentences.chinese: 沒想老大不小，仍然沒人光顧。

sentences.english: If he refused to come, he would hurt the feelings of the old woman.
sentences.chinese: 他如果不肯來，就會使老大娘不高興。

definition: second-eldest child in a family/(euphemism) penis
eldest brother/big brother (polite address for a man of about the same age as oneself)/gang leader/boss
brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
my (you etc) old father/polite appellation for an elderly male
adoptive father (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)
